leadText.title: Order accounting documents
leadText.description: Ordering accounting documents through the electronic document management system TEK-Torg is a service that allows you to receive quickly and sign accounting documents and a reconciliation report. To get the service, it is necessary to register in the EDMS TEK-Torg.

sideCard.title: The reconciliation report in automatic mode is provided only through the EDMS TEK-Torg. The electronic document management system allows:

content.text: Receive and send electronic documents instantly
Submit documents in electronic form to the regulatory authorities
Around the clock, on-line, carry out any operations with documents: search, downloading, printing, reconciliation, rejection, as well as tracking their movement

bannerText.title: Order accounting documents
text: If you have already registered in the EDMS TEK-Torg, then check presence of documents in your account in the EDMS TEK-Torg. You can find the history of debiting funds in the personal account on the electronic trading platform in the section "Finances" → "Transaction History".
If for any reason you have not received accounting documents, JSC "TEK-Torg" offers you to issue a request for the provision of documents through the EDMS TEK-Torg.

forma1.title: Order accounting documents
forma1.text: Dear customer, in case you are not registered in EDMS TEK-Torg, this application will be canceled. To receive the requested documents you need to go through all the stages of registration in the EDMS TEK-Torg, and then fill out the request form again.

forma2.title: Order a reconciliation report
forma2.text: Dear customer, in case you are not registered in EDMS TEK-Torg, this application will be canceled. To receive the requested documents you need to go through all the stages of registration in the EDMS TEK-Torg, and then fill out the request form again.
